about_the_game:
Ddraig Goch's Tyranny Pack 4


This product depicts 57 uniquely designed, 3D rendered tokens to be used in your fantasy role-playing games. The pack consists of both good and evil forces. Cultists both male and female, Dopplegangers, Wizards, Merchants both male and female, Hobgoblins, Giant Spiders, Ettercaps, Assassins, Guards both male and female. And as a bonus, have included wagons, carts and carriages to make a caravan chain.

This Token Pack includes:

  • 4 Assassins
  • 5 Undercover Cultists
  • 2 Dopplegangers
  • 2 Dopplegangers in Disguise
  • Druid
  • 3 Ettercaps
  • 2 Female Dwarfe Guards
  • Female Halfling Teamster
  • Female Human Merchant
  • 2 Giant Spiders
  • Half-Elf Monk
  • Female Halfling Assassin
  • 6 Hobgoblins
  • Hobgoblin Captain
  • Human Female Guard
  • Male Burried
  • Male Half-Elf Merchant
  • Male Halfling Teamster
  • Male Human Guard
  • 2 Male Human Merchants
  • Male Human Noble
  • Male Knight
  • Male Wizard
  • Paladin Leader
  • 2 Perytons
  • Red Wizard Undercover
  • Stag
  • Traveller
  • Wagon cover
  • 4 Covered Wagons Hitched/Unhitched
  • 5 Uncovered Wagons Hitched/Unhitched

Conversion by: James Holloway

Released on April 06, 2017. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 3.2.2 and higher.

Requires: An active subscription or one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and any ruleset.

pc_requirements.minimum:

  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
